law.catch_line: Purchase by officer at sale made by him void.
law.text: No officer shall, directly or indirectly, bid for or buy any property sold under an execution by him or his deputy, principal or codeputy. The right of property so sold and purchased by any such officer, or by another for his use, shall not thereby be changed. Any deed or bill of sale made for property so sold shall be void.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1711.
